item.title: Emergency
item.description: Immediate Safety If you or a patron feels unsafe, do not hesitate to use the following options: Emergency button at desk This will notify the police, and they will arrive within x minutes. This is a great and quick option, especially if it feels unsafe to place a phone call in front of patrons. Call 911 or dispatch at 603-448-1212. Lebanon Library: Call from Amy's office if you would like privacy from patrons.

item.title: On Desk
item.description: Ref ToolsOpens all tabs for ADP, Slack, Email, Koha, Wekan, and the Booking Calendar. Tools Wekan: For tasks on shift. Find opening and closing tasks, newspaper counts, and daily counts here. Reference Group Email:Check emails from patrons when on the reference desk. Koha: Circulation and item management. Booking Calendar: Book meeting rooms. NHU-PAC/NH State Library Catalog:Check if other libraries have a patron’s requested book. Readers Advisory Novelist: Find books to recommend to patrons.
